description: Try our easy to follow Chick Pea Burger Patties recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegie burger,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Low sugar,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Quick & easy lunch
name: Chick Pea Burger Patties Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chick peas, one cup of semidried tomatoes, mint leaves and chilli, deseeded and finely chopped.
Transfer to a food processor and pulse until coarsely combined.

Season with salt and pepper. Mix and form into 4 patties. Note: You can use bought breadcrumbs to crumb foods, but if you have a food processor it's easy to make your own. Remove the crusts from dayold white bread slices and cut into cubes. Transfer the cubes to the bowl of a food processor and process until finely chopped.
